examples: la apariencia física / externa / externa de algo
She had never been greatly concerned about her appearance.
Nunca se había preocupado mucho por su apariencia.
The dog was similar in general appearance to a spaniel.
El perro era similar en apariencia general a un spaniel.
He gave every appearance of (= seemed very much to be) enjoying himself.
Dio toda la apariencia de (= parecía mucho estar) divirtiéndose.
